CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 27, 1952, pg. 5 reads: "City's Yo-Yo Champion - Ronald Coleman, 2102 Bedford Avenue, who represented Kennard Playground, tied with Margaret Balzer of Arsenal Playground recently when first-place winners of yo-yo contests at all of the city's playgrounds met in front of the City-County Building in a city-wide championship competition. Second-place winners were Robert Jackson, Mellon Playground, and Margaret Caplan, Arlington Playground.  First-place winners received bicycles in competition sponsored by the Department of Parks and Recreation.  Ronald is shown, at this home, demonstrating his skill. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Yo-Yo Champion Ronald Coleman, wearing Department of Parks and Recreation Duncan Yo-Yo 1952 Winner t-shirt, demonstrating yo-yo manoeuvre in home at 2102 Bedford Avenue
